name: Infernape LV.X
author: Shizurow

poke_power.name: Burning Head
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Discard the other 2 cards. This power can’t be used if Infernape is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flare Up
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for 8 {R} Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck. (This attack does nothing if you don’t have 8 {R} Energy cards in your discard pile.)

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Infernape. Infernape LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
